data.title: Productions related to Smack The Pony
meta_keywords: See Also Like Comedy Programmes Films Recommendations Ideas What To Watch Smack The Pony related similar
data.meta_description: If you like Smack The Pony you may also find these other titles of interest.
data.text:
Six Pairs Of Pants

A short-lived sketch show from the 1990s, featuring Simon Pegg and Jessica Hynes in one of their first collaborations.

Los Dos Bros

Mock-documentary about the strained relationship between a pair of half-brothers, Darren and Cavan.

Green Wing

Comedy about the childish and slightly mad staff working in a hospital.

Campus

Semi-improvised sitcom set on a university campus, following its unhinged staff.

Me And Mrs Jones

Sitcom about a modern woman balancing boyfriends, admirers, parenthood and an ex-husband.

Feel The Force

Edinburgh policewomen Sally Bobbins and Sally Frank are, at best, exceedingly incompetent.

Bearded Ladies

An all-woman radio sketch show from some of the writers behind Smack the Pony.

Meanwhile With The Bearded Ladies

A sitcom revolving around the unusual lives of four women - man-hungry Mel, mother Lucy, wannabe mum Jo and bossy Alex.

Gladiatress

Comedy adventure spoof about three unlikely heroines. Stars Smack The Pony's Doon Mackichan, Fiona Allen and Sally Phillips.
